GameFragment - Class in fragment
This fragment is used to display the current score of the players
GameFragment(PacmanGame) - Constructor for class fragment.GameFragment
Construct the GameFragment and adjusts the sprite used to display extra lives by removing black and replacing it with the color of the wall - this is because the sprite will be drawn on top of a wall and changing the colour allows it to blend in much better
